programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping) S1 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping»The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les loisirs) S1 (15/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les loisirs»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La Patrouille des neiges à la rescousse) S5 (n°12)
programme.desc: «La Patrouille des neiges à la rescousse»When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'équipe de construction de Blue) S3 (n°5)
programme.desc: «L'équipe de construction de Blue»Josh invites you to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le grand trésor des pirates / Des bananes en or) S1 (12/21)
programme.desc: «Le grand trésor des pirates / Des bananes en or»When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Princess and the Pirate Puppy) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Princess and the Pirate Puppy»Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Medievel Tides) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Medievel Tides»When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos) S3 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos»Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble's dream. The pups must rescue their super hero!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la petite souris) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la petite souris»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Teddy Maternello) S3 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Teddy Maternello»Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Surprise Box) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blue's Surprise Box»It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons»The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save A T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save A Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save A T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save A Playful Elephant Calf»Canine capers for the community-minded mutts who see everything as possible in their quest to make the world around them a better place for themselves and their four-footed friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc) S2 (n°208)
programme.desc: «La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc»Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer) S1 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»When an out-of-this-world visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark and his friends must put their stellar communication skills to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Grandma) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Coach Grandma»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (n°35)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le Voyage en train»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La voleuse de bonbons) S5 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La voleuse de bonbons»Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La poursuite de minuit) S4 (20/20)
programme.desc: «La poursuite de minuit»It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Jérémie le génie / L'acrobate) S3 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Jérémie le génie / L'acrobate»"Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur) S3 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur»Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant) S2 (n°206)
programme.desc: «La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant»Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Jump Up & Get Down) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Jump Up & Get Down»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines.

Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.desc: «Princess and the Pirate Puppy»Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend.

programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»

programme.desc: «Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos»Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble's dream. The pups must rescue their super hero!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la petite souris) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la petite souris»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Freddy Fox) S3 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Freddy Fox»Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'ours somnambule / Danny le pro du rodéo) S4 (9/26)
programme.desc: «L'ours somnambule / Danny le pro du rodéo»The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?) S2 (n°207)
programme.desc: «La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band) S1 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band»Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (n°34)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (34/52)
programme.desc: «L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'orage) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'orage»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course autour du monde) S5 (17/20)
programme.desc: «La course autour du monde»In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the World's Biggest Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les Jeux de la médaille d'or) S5 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Les Jeux de la médaille d'or»It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La bonne vieille source / Le poney) S3 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La bonne vieille source / Le poney»Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bébé Pingouin / Le spectacle des chats) S4 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le bébé Pingouin / Le spectacle des chats»Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc) S2 (n°208)
programme.desc: «La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc»Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?
